https://tmrev.io/movie/268956-Bubblegum and Broken Fingers 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jDaIQnKPyBuSyTVjDMOcd2MpaRb.jpg "If you don't have your own plan, you'll damn sure be a part of someone else's." That quote kicks off the first of multiple story lines, in the crime ensemble "Bubblegum & Broken Fingers." This character-driven collage of sex, violence and survival is equal parts western, gangster and love stories. We follow the journey of a mysterious silver briefcase and witness the havoc it brings each new owner. Bubblegum and Broken Fingers
